Constructor Detail

RasterIO


public RasterIO(String costFile,

                String stFile)

         throws IOException
Reads ascii rasters, stores cost surface, header with spatial information, and location of source/target vertices.

Parameters:
String - costFile: the path to the ascii file containing relative costs. Any negative values will be set to positive infinity, meaning that no paths will go through those vertices.
String - stFile: the path to the ascii file containing source (marked as -1) and target (marked as -2) vertices. The results may or may not be the same if source and target vertices are exchanged. The ascii raster must have a header with 6 lines, otherwise an exception is thrown.
Throws:
IOException
Method Detail

getArray


public MyVertex[][] getArray()
Returns the MyVertex[][] array representing the cost surface.

Returns:
MyVertex[][] the array with relative costs.

getCols


public int getCols()
Returns column dimension of the costArray.

Returns:
int number of columns.

getRows


public int getRows()
Returns row dimension of the costArray.

Returns:
int number of rows.

getSourceSet


public HashSet getSourceSet()
Returns the source vertices.

Returns:
HashSet a set containing all vertices marked as source.

getTargetSet


public HashSet getTargetSet()
Returns the target vertices.

Returns:
HashSet a set containing all vertices marked as target.

main


public static void main(String[] args)

                 throws IOException
Main will read a test raster (input by user) and print info to screen.

Throws:
IOException

printToScreen


public void printToScreen(MyVertex[][] vertexArray)
Prints raster to screen for debugging purposes. Not to be used with large rasters.

Parameters:
MyVertex[][] - vertexArray: the array to be printed to screen.

randomRaster


public void randomRaster(String outputFile,

                         int nrows,

                         int ncols)

                  throws IOException
Creates a random integer raster and prints to file.

Parameters:
String - outputFile: the name of the ascii file for output.
int - nrows: the number of rows in the raster
int - ncols: the number of columns in the raster
Throws:
IOException

writeRaster


public void writeRaster(MyVertex[][] vertexArray,

                        String outputFile)

                 throws IOException
Converts MyVertex[][] array into ascii file

Parameters:
MyVertex[][] - vertexArray: the array to be output. The "cost" field from each vertex is written to file.
String - outputFile: the name of the ascii raster file for output.
Throws:
IOException
